name: Skeletal Thrall
effect: You touch a pile of bones or dessicated corpse, giving it an eldritch semblance of life. It rises and acknowledges you as its master, and will follow you into combat and obey your commands unto death. The thrall has a mitigation score of 3, 10 HP, and a score of 6 for every attribute.
note: The raised thrall has no weapons, armor, or spellcasting ability of any kind, but you may use an action to hand it a small or medium weapon.

modifiers.Integrity: The thrall's strength, dexterity, and speed scores are increased by 1 for every 2 points of intelligence above 12.
modifiers.Durability: The thrall's HP is increased by 2 for every point of willpower above 12.
